articles.title: Boy's heartbreaking letter to Santa 'only asking for love' goes viral - TODAY
articles.description: Little boy's letter asking if Santa if he supports the LGBTQ community since he is gay is going viral ahead of USPS Operation Santa's launch for 2020.
articles.content:
It's a time-honored tradition to write to Santa Claus.
But some kids don't want the latest toy or a new iPhone they just want to help their family pay the bills or to be loved.

articles.author: Stephen T. Watson News Staff Reporter
articles.title: Erie County daily positive rate nears 10%, WNY hits 8% - Buffalo News
articles.description: The daily positive rate for the county reached 9.9% Thursday, with 622 new Covid-19 cases confirmed out of 6,256 tests performed.
articles.content:
Erie County Executive Mark Poloncarz said Thursday's Covid-19 positive test rate for the county came back at nearly 10% and the rolling, seven-day average has now surpassed 7%.
